title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the build is already done automatically without the need for a manual build.
OB: - The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled.
EB: - The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should only be enabled when a manual build is required.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Right-click in the code editor or package explorer to open the context sensitive popup menu.
3. Observe that the "Build" action is always enabled, regardless of whether a manual build is needed or not.
